name: A&W
address: A\u0026W Canada, 6241 200 St, Langley City, BC V2Y 1A2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Mozza
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly seasoned grass-fed beef patty topped with real mozzarella cheese, mouth-watering bacon from pork raised without the use of antibiotics, crisp lettuce, tomato and Mozza® sauce, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Teen
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly seasoned grass-fed beef patty topped with real cheddar cheese, mouth-watering bacon from pork raised without the use of antibiotics, crisp lettuce, onion, tomato, pickles and Teen® sauce, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Our fries are thick-cut and served with the skin on, so you’re always reminded that they’re made from 100% Canadian-grown Russet potatoes.

hasMenuItem.name: Rings
hasMenuItem.description: Our classic onion rings are handcrafted in-store, made from fresh onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Buddy
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly seasoned 1.6 oz grass-fed beef patty topped with freshly grilled onions, ketchup, mustard and Teen® sauce, served on a freshly toasted bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Servie avec nos bonnes frites maison, fromages en grains, accompagnée de notre sauce à poutine.

hasMenuItem.name: Beyond
hasMenuItem.description: A Beyond Meat patty made from plants, topped with crisp lettuce, red onion, tomato, pickles, ketchup, mustard and mayonnaise, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Strips 5
hasMenuItem.description: Deliciously seasoned 100% chicken breast pieces – from chickens raised without the use of antibiotics – battered and breaded to perfection with toasted wheat crumbs, wheat flour and tangy spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Chubby Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Deliciously seasoned 100% chicken breast – from chickens raised without the use of antibiotics – battered and breaded to perfection with toasted wheat crumbs, wheat flour and spices, topped with mayo and crisp lettuce, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: 2 Chipotle Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Deliciously seasoned 100% chicken breast – from chickens raised without the use of antibiotics – battered and breaded to perfection with toasted wheat crumbs, wheat flour and spices, wrapped inside a flour tortilla with real cheddar cheese, chipotle mayo and crisp lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheddar Bacon Uncle
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly seasoned 5 oz grass-fed beef patty topped with real cheddar cheese, mouth-watering bacon from pork raised without the use of antibiotics, red onion, crisp lettuce, pickles and a tomato, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Mama
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly seasoned grass-fed beef patty topped with pickles, a slice of onion, ketchup, mustard and Teen® sauce, served on a freshly toasted sesame seed bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Whistle Dog
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly cooked pork wiener — from pork raised without the use of antibiotics — grilled and split down the middle, filled with mouth-watering bacon, real cheddar cheese, and sweet cucumber relish, all loaded into a freshly toasted hot dog bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Kids Hot Dog
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly cooked pork wiener — from pork raised without the use of antibiotics — with ketchup, loaded into a freshly toasted hot dog bun. Enjoy with wholesome sides of apple slices, a MadeGood™ granola bar and 2% milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Masala Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: A crispy patty made with Nanak paneer and real vegetables, topped with spicy piri piri sauce, layers of crisp whole-leaf lettuce, sliced tomato and red onion, all sandwiched between a freshly toasted seeded bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Dog
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly cooked pork wiener — from pork raised without the use of antibiotics — loaded into a freshly toasted hot dog bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Sweet Cream Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Rich and flavourful natural dark chocolate and sweet cream made with 100% Canadian dairy, blended with ice. Small: 320 calories, regular: 500 calories.

hasMenuItem.name: Frozen A&W Root Beer
hasMenuItem.description: Classic A&W Root Beer® made with natural cane sugar and natural flavours, blended with ice. Small: 200 calories, regular: 340 calories.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Sweet Cream Shake
hasMenuItem.description: Real strawberry fruit puree and sweet cream made with 100% Canadian dairy, blended with ice. Small: 260 calories, regular: 410 calories.

hasMenuItem.name: Mixed Berry Acai Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy the tropical taste of açaí and real strawberry, raspberry and blueberry fruit puree, blended with ice. Small: 220 calories, regular: 300 calories.

hasMenuItem.name: Latte
hasMenuItem.description: A flavourful organic espresso shot combined with perfectly steamed, smooth and creamy milk. Small: 130 calories, regular: 160 cal, large: 180 calories.

hasMenuItem.name: Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Organic Fairtrade espresso and natural dark chocolate flavour topped with steamed milk. Small: 250 calories, regular: 350 calories, large: 450 calories.

review.reviewBody: Burgers were good, disappointed that the apple pies were missing.

They put a :-) on my bag which really brightened this rainy day. 
They also were able to deliver my request and changes which was great.
happy customer!
Onion Rings were hot, but too salty.  Normally they are not too salty.
Mozzarella a Burger® was good Hot Apple Turnover was also good
Fries and onion rings were. But under seasoned and the burgers weren't as saucy as I remember.
